descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff0000][b]Harry Balls [/b][/color][color=#f4f4f4]- Let's make Skyrim cry![/color][/size]

This is a conjuration spell that [color=#ff0000]cost nothing.

[/color]He is very usefull when you like to sneak and do not want to be seen, he attacks, and you can sneak. Enemies mostly focus on Harry.
He has a large range: you can summon him far from you and close to you.

Very usefull on[b][color=#ff0000] LEGENDARY.[/color][/b]

Harry Balls has is a fire mage with a shout. Harry Balls also summons a Harry Balls who summons a Harry Balls etc etc. 
The Harry's summoned by the harry summoned by you, will disappear 1 minute after the battle.

When you face a lot of enemies, you can have infinitive Harry's!

You get him by pickpocket Nazeem for the spelltome

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]NOTE:[/b][/size][/color]

Harry Balls will disappear after 2 hours, so you have to summon him again. 
Maybe I am going to change the duration of Harry Balls later on, depends on what the uploaders want. For now it is 2 hours, maybe later on shorter.

[color=#ff0000]Does NOT require the DLC's[/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Next update[/b]:
[/size][/color]
There will be only 1 update later on: voice acting, still trying to find out how that works.

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Installation:[/size][/color]

[b][size=3]Manually:[/size][/b]
Put the .esp file into your data folder, that is all

Special thanks to:

[color=#ff0000]Keessnorface[/color] for helping me with CK

[color=#ff0000]Do NOT[/color] use this mod to modify without my permission

Please endorse if you like the mod :-)

[color=#ff0000][size=3]Graphic mods:[/size][/color]

Far Off ENB - CGI Series by [b]far327[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50764/?

Enhanced Lights and FX by [b]anamorfus[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?
author: Osiris Dragonia
